title: Angie's Testimony
meta_content: There are few things worse then a bummed back. The Holy Ghost is a master chiropracter, he can even grow body parts out!
content:
I had problems with a deteriorating disk can vertebrate in my back. I had suffered and been in pain for years. I had been to doctors, chiropractors and therapy. Nothing seemed to help much. I went to bible study with Karen Walker at Pastor Tomâ€™s apartment. He started the bible study and as I was sitting on the couch I was in tremendous pain. Pastor Tom prayed and my legs grew out and my arms grew out. He told me to bend over and I did. No pain — Jesus healed me instantly! Praise God! Angie
Reno, NV
